sequence: <size=51>And thus the sun once again sinks into the desolate darkness, the hollow of despair where no prayer can reach</size>
<size=51>O those who were born into an era of false gods, wise is the teacher who guides the poet.</size>
<size=51>You turned your head up, seeking salvation from above.</size>
<size=51>Your journey has crossed through the Nine Circles.</size>
<size=51>Your journey shall ascend the Seven Crowns towards Paradise.</size>
<size=51>Your footsteps shall know no pause, even as the seas of flame consume your form.</size>
<size=51>The trials of tribulation thus end, and the path of hope is opened.</size>
<size=51>The fruit of Paradise is not freely shared...</size>

scripts.say: I'm fine. It's just a scratch.
We're equipped with the most durable armor out there, and it's not just for show.
Tenacemente e ardisco ad ogni impresa! Our courage and resolve will not be overlooked.
Sardegnian warships are just as persistent as Illustrious said. Can't say I'm a fan.
Let me handle this. Don't forget Her Majesty's orders - concentrate on that first.
Of course. "Seize the Jewel of Calabria before midnight."
There's no time to waste. Take Orion with you. You already know what to do.
Godspeed, Warspite, and God Save the Queen.
Think I'd let you get away so easily? Fiiire!
Warspite rushed in, causing Zara's shot to go wide.
I wouldn't recommend taking your eyes off of me.
Aw, look at you, the hero rushing to save the damsel in distress. Are you sure you should leave her alone though?
Heh. Actually, it'll be much easier to deal with you without her around.
"To The Right Honourable Flagship: My sister is in your care. As this is her first sortie, I trust you will ensure her safety in case of any unexpected mishaps."
A chill ran down Warspite's spine as she recalled the telegram.
No matter. Come then, bring your guns to bear and let us see who is the stronger! Belli dura despicio!
